metadata.title: CVE-2022-3128 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: The Donation Thermometer WordPress plugin before 2.1.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
